jol.types.basic
Class Schema

java.lang.Object
  jol.types.basic.Schema

public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object

A schema a simply an ordered list of variables that provide a name to tuple attributes. The variables are taken from predicates in programs specific to a rule.

Field Summary
protected  TableName name
          The table name that this schema references.
protected  java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,Variable> variables
          A hash from the string variable name to the variable itself.
